home.title: Community Water Watch
home.subtitle: Empowering communities to solve water issues together

jalJeevanMission.title: Jal Jeevan Mission
jalJeevanMission.description: Providing safe and adequate drinking water through individual household tap connections by 2024.

atalBhujalYojana.title: Atal Bhujal Yojana
atalBhujalYojana.description: Sustainable groundwater management with community participation in water-stressed areas.

report.title: Report a Water Issue
report.clickMapText: Click on the map to select the location of the issue
report.descriptionPlaceholder: Please provide details about the issue...

actionPlan.title: Your Water Safety Plan
actionPlan.goodManagement: Water management in your area is good!
actionPlan.subtitle: AI-generated recommendations based on water issues in your area
actionPlan.improveScore: Complete recommended actions and report water issues to improve your score
actionPlan.aiRecommendations: AI-generated recommendations based on your area's water issues

recommendations.leak: Fix the reported leak in your neighborhood within 48 hours
recommendations.fixtures: Install water-efficient fixtures in your home
recommendations.rainwater: Participate in the community rainwater harvesting initiative
recommendations.contamination: Report any signs of water contamination immediately

actionPlan.tryDifferent: Try different keywords or browse categories
actionPlan.aiSuggestions: Try asking our AI assistant about these topics:

flooding.title: What to do during flooding
flooding.description: Turn off electricity, move valuable items to higher ground, and evacuate if necessary. Avoid walking through moving water.

contamination.title: Dealing with contaminated water
contamination.description: Boil water for at least one minute before drinking. Use bottled water for cooking. Report to local authorities immediately.

leak.title: Emergency pipe leak response
leak.description: Turn off the main water valve immediately. Use towels to contain the spread and call a plumber as soon as possible.

daily.title: Daily water conservation tips
daily.description: Fix leaky faucets, take shorter showers, and turn off taps when brushing teeth. Use water-efficient appliances.

rainwater.title: Rainwater harvesting basics
rainwater.description: Install rain barrels to collect rainwater from rooftops. Use this water for gardens and non-potable purposes.

garden.title: Reducing water usage in gardens
garden.description: Water plants during early morning or evening. Use drip irrigation systems and mulch to reduce evaporation.

reports.title: Understanding water quality reports
reports.description: Learn to read and understand the annual water quality reports provided by your local water supplier.

contamination.title: Signs of water contamination
contamination.description: Watch for unusual odor, color, or taste in water. Cloudy appearance or floating particles may indicate contamination.

testing.title: Home water testing guide
testing.description: Use home water testing kits to check for common contaminants. Professional testing is recommended for serious concerns.

notification.title: Emergency Alert Message
notification.placeholder: Enter alert message to broadcast to all users in the affected area

table.noIssues: No issues matching your filter criteria

footer.description: Empowering communities to solve water issues together. Report, track, and resolve water problems in your area.
